mapper.sql: id, template_name, description, course_hours, academic_year, semester, max_students, status, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_course_template (template_name, description, course_hours, academic_year, semester, max_students, status, create_time, update_time, deleted) VALUES (#{templateName}, #{description}, #{courseHours}, #{academicYear}, #{semester}, #{maxStudents}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleted})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_course_template WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT FROM sys_course_template WHERE template_name = #{templateName} AND deleted = 0
SELECT FROM sys_course_template WHERE academic_year = #{academicYear} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT FROM sys_course_template
deleted = 0
AND (template_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
